Texts.Chs: 对于化学，你现在已经有了一定的基础了，所以制作一些^orange;DNA样本^reset;吧，如果你把^green;炼金台升级到化学操作台^reset;后，那么你就可以制作它们了。
Texts.Eng: Now that the basics are clear to you, try making some essential ^orange;DNA Samples^reset; in the ^orange;Chemistry Lab^reset;. ^green;Upgrade your Alchemy Table^reset; to access it.

Texts.Chs: 少了DNA，将会使你的细胞研究毫无进展，更别说创造物种、改造生命了。所以多准备一些吧！
Texts.Eng: Without DNA, you'll have a hard time doing much xenobiology. You can't create or modify life without this resource. Stockpile it!
